#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long 
using namespace std;
typedef pair <ll , ll> p;
ll n;
vector<p> v;

int main()
{
	scanf("%lld", &n);
	ll i;
	ll s, m;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld", &s, &m);
		v.push_back(make_pair(-1*s*m, i));
	}
	
	make_heap(v.begin(), v.end());
	sort_heap(v.begin(), v.end());
	int q;
	scanf("%d", &q);
	ll k;
	for(i=1;i<=q;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &k);
		printf("%lld\n", abs(v[k-1].second)+1);
	}
	return 0;
}
